email_body: probably not. it would have to have a lot of upside. never hurts to listen though slafontaine@globalp.com on 02/05/2001 07:45:28 AM To: John.Arnold@enron.com cc: Subject: Re: diff topic i was in ny friday-had an interesting conversation with a company. would there ver be a cirmcumstanbce in which you would consider leaving your currant situation? dont have to say on this and this is purely preliminary but you came to mind . just a yes or no at this stage would do. ill let you more later on phone.
